Description:
Detects TOKEN OBFUSCATION technique from Invoke-Obfuscation

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Powershell Token Obfuscation - Powershell
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((scriptblocktext re '\w+`(\w+|-|.)`[\w+|\s]' and scriptblocktext re '"(\{\d\}){2,}"\s*-f' and scriptblocktext re '(?i)\$\{`?e`?n`?v`?:`?p`?a`?t`?h`?\}') and  not (scriptblocktext like '%${env:path}%' or (scriptblocktext like '%it will return true or false instead%' or scriptblocktext like '%the function also prevents `get-itemproperty` from failing%') or (path like 'c:\program files\microsoft\exchange server\%' and path like '%\bin\servicecontrol.ps1' and scriptblocktext like '%`r`n%')))
